SMC_POSINFO (STRUCT)
SMC_POSINFO (STRUCT)
Â¶
TYPE SMC_POSINFO : STRUCT
This data type describes its coordinates and the positions of
the additional axes for a particular position point.
InOut:
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
iFrameNo
INT
In this variable additional information not relevant for the
SoftMotion modules may be stored by the user.
wAuxData
SMC_ADDAXIS
((ADDAXIS_X OR ADDAXIS_Y) OR ADDAXIS_Z)
Bit by bit description of position axis to be calculated by the
SMC_Interpolator
.
wSProfile
SMC_ADDAXIS
ADDAXIS_NONE
Additional axes that have their bit set are interpolated in
sigmoid (S-) shape instead of linearly.
dX
LREAL
X-position in coordinate system
dY
LREAL
Y-position in coordinate system
dZ
LREAL
Z-position in coordinate system
dA
LREAL
Position of additional axis A
dB
LREAL
Position of additional axis B
dC
LREAL
Position of additional axis C
dA1
LREAL
Position of additional axis P
dA2
LREAL
Position of additional axis Q
dA3
LREAL
Position of additional axis U
dA4
LREAL
Position of additional axis V
dA5
LREAL
Position of additional axis W
dA6
LREAL
Position of additional axis A6 (cannot be programmed with
G-code)

rows.Name: iFrameNo
rows.Comment:
In this variable additional information not relevant for the
SoftMotion modules may be stored by the user.

rows.Name: wAuxData
rows.Comment: Bit by bit description of position axis to be calculated by theSMC_Interpolator.

rows.Name: wSProfile
rows.Comment:
Additional axes that have their bit set are interpolated in
sigmoid (S-) shape instead of linearly.

rows.Name: dA6
rows.Comment:
Position of additional axis A6 (cannot be programmed with
G-code)
